name: Kittychen Scramble
description:
Kittychen Scramble

Serve your customers but keep the kitty happy

1. Roll for resources. (Click the Dice)

2. Learn to bake from the recipe book.

3. Bake using your appliances.

4. Serve the orders as they come in.

Made by Edric Yu and Imani Muya

Special Thanks to jbernard3396

 This game is a web app built with ReactJS. No game engine was used. Source code is available on GitHub. 

Thanks to the free resources we used.

Sounds from Zapsplat.com

Music "And Just Like That" from freepd.com by Bryan Teoh
